titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1332) to improve the access to capital programs of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1332) to improve the access to capital programs of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-108, by Mr. Arcuri.

All points of order against the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Small Business now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 43.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 330.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 196 (Roll no. 258).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1332 (Small Business Lending Improvements Act of 2007).
